select item_seq.nextval from dual
insert into item values(#{itemNum}||'#{seq}',#{itemName},0,0,#{itemPprice},#{itemSprice},0,#{itemVendor},'',0)
mapper.update: update item set ITEM_USGAE=1 where ITEM_NUM=#{itemNum}
mapper.select:
select * from item
ITEM_NUM LIKE '%'||#{itemNum}||'%'
AND ITEM_NAME=#{itemName}
order by ITEM_NAME asc
select ITEM_QTY from item where ITEM_NUM=#{itemNum}

select distinct ITEM_VENDOR from item
ITEM_VENDOR like '%'||#{itemVendor}||'%'
order by ITEM_VENDOR asc
mapper.update: update item set ITEM_QTY+=#{change} where ITEM_NUM=#{itemNum}
